goal: Find a budget hotel for the weekend
context: "I'm planning a road trip with some friends and we need to find an affordable hotel for the weekend. We have a tight budget due to the expenses of the trip, but still want a clean and comfortable place to rest. The location should be easily accessible from major highways and ideally have parking available."

turns.text: "Hey, I'm planning a road trip with some friends and we need to find a budget-friendly hotel for the weekend. It doesn't have to be fancy, just clean and comfortable, and close to major highways with parking available."

"I've found some budget hotels that might suit your needs. For example, Hotel A near Highway X offers affordable rooms with free parking. It has good reviews for cleanliness. Another option is Hotel B, which is located near major high
"Great! Those options sound good. Could you please provide more details about the prices for each hotel during the weekend we're planning to stay?"
"Certainly! Hotel A charges around $70 per night on weekends, while Hotel B is slightly more expensive at approximately $85 per night. Both hotels offer discounts for booking in advance."
"That's helpful! Could you check if there are any further discounts or special deals available for either Hotel A or Hotel B during our stay dates, as we're trying to keep costs low?"

I will check the websites of both hotels for any ongoing promotions or discounts during your stay dates. Here's what I found: Hotel A offers a 10% discount for booking online at least three days in advance, while Hotel B

"Perfect! It seems like both hotels could work for us. Can you please confirm if we can still take advantage of these discounts or promotions when booking now, even though it's less than three days before our stay?"

I have checked with both hotels regarding your request for late online booking discounts. Hotel A will still apply the 10% online booking discount for stays within three days when booked now through their website using the promo code "ROADTR
"Great! It looks like both hotels are suitable for our needs and budget. Could you please provide me with the direct links to book Hotel A and Hotel B using those promotional codes?"
